name: Phantom Brave: We Meet Again
description:
Phantom Brave: We Meet Again is a strategy game. It was originally released in 2009.
You can play Phantom Brave: We Meet Again on Wii.
Haru Akenaga and Sōhei Niikawa produced the game. Shinichi Ikeda, Takeshi Hasegawa and Yoshitsuna Kobayashi directed the game. Tenpei Sato scored the game.
